Action.author: hayorov
Action.body: = shim.ERROR { endorserLogger.Error("DEBUG:", err, res) endorserLogger.Errorf(" %s %s simulateProposal() resulted in chaincode %s response status %d for txid: %s", chainID, shorttxid(txid), hdrExt.ChaincodeId, res.Status, txid) var cceventBytes byte if ccevent != nil { cceventBytes, err = putils.GetBytesChaincodeEvent(ccevent) if err != nil { return nil, errors.Wrap(err, "failed to marshal event bytes") } } {code} 2. Get error in peer log: {code} 2018-10-06 18:11:06.296 UTC endorser ProcessProposal -> ERRO 163 DEBUG: status:500 message:"access denied for JoinChain ch0 : Failed verifying that proposal's creator satisfies local MSP principal during channelless check policy with policy Admins : This identity is not an admin " {code} 3. Fixed an issue with MSP key file. Recap: Invalid issue due to the incorrect key was used. For fabric, I think it would be nice to improve the DEBUG logging for such kind of chaincodes. And big thanks ~yacovm for great assisting and help. >

Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: TLDR - ~denyeart , ~sykesm we need to add loging for SCC errors in the endorser...

Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: ~hayorov would you like to submit a patch that adds such a logging?

Action.author: hayorov
Action.body: ~yacovm Yes, I will raise a PR with such small logging improvement tomorrow.
